storyInfo: Secunda and Irene uncover that the disappearance of the data scientist may be linked to the Church of the Deep. When a squadron sent to place a beacon at a Seaborn nest is attacked, the Abyssal Hunters launch a rescue mission.

attributes.content: *pant* *pant* Gotta hurry!
Caulerpa archaeosphaeridium? Here? Who else in Milliarium is cultivating endangered seaweed?
Hypnea fenestralis, Halymenia fimbriatus, Palmaria purpureus...
Wait, the color of this Sargassum pennata... I cultivated it myself...
Why are you on the streets... it's too dry. You'll die.
What happened here? Did someone do this?
Where are you migrating? Is there something—
W-Wait!
They're gone?
This pipe...
Wah!
This is...
*cough* Argh—
(What's going on?)
(The rumbling... Is the city moving?)
(Something's moving—who's there?)
(Vacuole inflates merrily)
attributes.name: Seaborn

attributes.content: I hope I'm not interrupting anything.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: Not at all. Lucilla and I were just performing regular inspections and maintenance on the city's unit framework.
attributes.name: Cassia

attributes.content: Still no sign of Tullia?
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: C'mon, Lucilla, it hasn't been that long since we made the report.
attributes.name: Cassia

attributes.content: I can tell you care about her. Did she mention getting into any trouble recently?
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: She isn't one to look for trouble. I can't imagine her offending anyone.
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: What you say certainly fits her profile. Did she ever talk to you about the Waterway Program or beacon data?
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: I wouldn't say we're close, exactly. We talk from time to time, but she's more of a loner who prefers to work on her own stuff.
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: Wait, is she a suspect?
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: Sorry, maybe I'm making her sound suspicious...
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: B-But it's probably just stress. There's been fighting almost every day in the six months that Milliarium has been away from the home territories. Everyone here is on edge.
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: The Church of the Deep continues its attempts to sabotage the Waterway Program. We've eliminated many cultists over those months.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: And until they were exposed, they appeared just like any of our countrymen.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: But she'd have no reason to—
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: Well, to be honest, I've never quite understood why she chose to join the Waterway Program.
attributes.name: Cassia

attributes.content: What do you mean, ma'am?
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: You already know that she used to work at the Institute of Ecological Art, right?
attributes.name: Cassia

attributes.content: The IEA moved to another city when this one evacuated its original position and received new battle orders.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: Right, and she had the chance to go with them to continue her work. But instead, she chose to—
attributes.name: Cassia

attributes.content: Sorry to interrupt, but could you explain more about this evacuation you mentioned?
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: You remember, don't you Lucilla? You were working on the dome at the time, so you had the best view of the whole thing.
attributes.name: Cassia

attributes.content: ...Yeah.
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: It was one of Ægir's largest volcanic power stations, feeding countless laboratories, and Milliarium was responsible for its construction and defense.
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: The city was parked beneath the power station. Through the dome, I could see its red glow illuminate the ocean for miles.
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: The heat it generated attracted many different creatures. It was the largest endangered plants reserve in Ægir.
attributes.name: Cassia

attributes.content: And the ideal environment for Milliarium's ecological art to flourish.
attributes.name: Cassia

attributes.content: Then, that light turned dark...
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: Seaborn?
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: Yeah.
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: A year ago, swarms of Seaborn arrived on the ocean currents, and Milliarium ordered an emergency evacuation.
attributes.name: Cassia

attributes.content: Without the natural environment to support it, the Institute of Ecological Art, like other related institutions, was forced to relocate.
attributes.name: Cassia

attributes.content: But there was a full Legion in the city. We could have retaken the power station.
attributes.name: Cassia

attributes.content: War orders for the Waterway Program had just arrived. Milliarium was in fact being strategically redeployed.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: I came here with the Legion after that.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: The lives of so many of our people were changed... including Lucilla.
attributes.name: Cassia

attributes.content: By the way, I transferred from the dome to ground work because I was afraid of heights... Sorry, off-topic.
attributes.name: Lucilla
Secunda
attributes.content: So you mean to say that Tullia might have had ulterior motives for joining the Waterway Program?

attributes.name: Secunda
attributes.content: That is a serious accusation.
I don't believe it either.
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: No, no, I'm just telling you what I know.
attributes.name: Cassia

attributes.content: But... it's undeniable that there are a hundred thousand souls in this city, and not all of them are fully committed to the Waterway Program.
attributes.name: Cassia

attributes.content: Most just carry on with their lives, not understanding the kind of path we're clearing out in the ocean.
attributes.name: Cassia

attributes.content: Even our Iberian guest here came to learn more about the Program, didn't she?
attributes.name: Cassia

attributes.content: Whether Tullia is linked with the Church of the Deep or not, the fact remains that she made an unauthorized copy of data on the Waterway Program.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: We'll have to find her to learn why.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: But Milliarium isn't that big. She'd have been found by now, even if she were hiding between dome layers or in the corners of the circulation system.
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: True. She may well have already left the city, but we were unable to find her bio-signature in the nearby waters.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: Nor were there any unscheduled ship movements at the port. And she couldn't have gone beyond our sensor range in just a few days using civilian deep-water equipment.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: However... the city did make a short movement around 30 hours ago to receive the Iberian mission. Perhaps...
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: Could she have left the city at that time?
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: ...So, the Columbian scientist Kristen Wright broke through the barrier for the first time in more than ten thousand years.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: The hole she pierced hasn't completely closed, even after a year. Ægir's surveillance of the universe through this opening continues, and so far no anomalies have been detected.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: I tried to stop her, to no avail.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: We still have time, but it's running short.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Ripping apart the electron clouds with a high-energy beam... We were not aware of any energy sources on land that could support such a brute-force measure.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: Her method came from the same place as Ægir's technology: prehistoric civilization.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: She had discovered sarcophagi beneath Trimounts that preserved that civilization's spark, and managed to obtain the trust of its custodian.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Before leaving the home territories, I had not expected to find anyone with your profound understanding of both Ægir and prehistory from the lands.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: You have demonstrated, once again, that there is still much about Terra we do not understand.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: Fins trapped in the depths lose their perception of light. Likewise, our nation must continue to explore, even if we can no longer support grand expansions.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: The stargate, the twin moons, the barrier, the ruins in the mantle... There is much on this planet that was not formed naturally.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: Our voyager fleets, having traversed to the far side of the planet, have even detected highly unusual terrain concealed behind the distant dark fog.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: There, the sea currents abruptly cut off, as though they had reached the end of the ocean.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: That is merely a hotbed that has long since cooled. The most important prehistoric relics lie in the Ægir heartlands. You know this, Madame Consul.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The prehistoric ruins beneath the seabed are a gift from the ocean to Ægir. They nurtured your civilization, and have granted you power and knowledge far beyond the terrestrial nations.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: And with them, responsibility.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: As you say, Dr. Kal'tsit, responsibility.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: When did the land dwellers first start calling themselves 'human'? When they lit the first fire with Originium? Built their first city with stone and mud?
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: On land, self-awareness and identity were established naturally over time. Even today, humanity is often defined in the narrowest terms.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: For the Ægir, it was conferred. We were not the same race as the Predecessors, but we inherited their identity as we inherited their mantle.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: Thus, Ægir was born with a responsibility to humanity. The Seaborn will not compel us to abandon this duty; on the contrary, they add to its weight.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: You are indeed the right consul for Milliarium, Madame Consul.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Where is this coming from...?
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: Your temperament. As Ægir, you are patient and kind.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But that does not diminish the arrogance in your thinking; that is to say, Ægir's arrogance.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I do not believe our conversations about the hole in the barrier, the ruins in the mantle, and even the future of civilization itself, are merely small talk to lighten the mood.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Just as I do not believe Ægir will rely on passive solutions. After all, isn't Millarium's department from its home territories a proactive effort to create a new line of defense?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: So, my question is, Madame Consul: what is Ægir's endgame for the Waterway?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: ...I have already told Gladiia Ægir's answer, that which you would call arrogant. You have the right to know as well.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: There is much on this planet that was not formed naturally... and Ægir does not believe they are unrelated.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: Be they wonders like the stargate and the twin moons, or calamities like Originium and the Seaborn, these phenomena cannot be random products of spontaneity. They must be interconnected in some way.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: To solve the Seaborn problem at its source and stop Terra's crisis, we need to fully understand Terra, including the hidden secrets of the land.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: But those are for the future. If you simply seek my answer for what's at hand...
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: My endgame for the Waterway is to ensure that hundreds of thousands of Millarium's inhabitants and tens of thousands of Penal Battalion troops in Gran Faro live to see Ægir's main force arrive.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: Distress signal.
attributes.name: 'Little Handy'

attributes.content: From the squadron tasked with beacon deployment at Nest 37.
attributes.name: 'Little Handy'

attributes.content: You're sharp.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.options: Saved me the effort of looking for you.;Do you always come and go without warning?

attributes.content: How much has Milliarium told you of the Waterway Program?
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.options: Thought you'd care more about the Hunters.;Thought you'd care more about your circumstances.

attributes.content: The tribunal has demonstrated their innocence, and they are not alone.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: Besides, Gladiia’s return to Ægir and its conspiracies are of her own accord.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: Neither of us is being followed or under surveillance, so my movements have not been exposed.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: Let's continue where we left off at the Sophontheatrum.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: The war between Ægir and the Seaborn has gone on for more than two centuries, but both sides have set their sights on dry land at almost simultaneously.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: The sudden migration of an entire species, and a change in direction for an entire nation. Perhaps, deep down, they stem from the same cause.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.options: Sounds like you don't trust any of Ægir's plans.;You still have your reservations about us, Ulpianus.

attributes.content: I know more than I've told Gladiia. This extra knowledge forces me to be cautious about Ægir's past and future actions.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: But it's too soon for her to know, and not your place to know at all.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: Our only concern for now is the Waterway Program.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: A path connecting the land and the sea... Neither that doctor nor the Inquisition fully trust in this, or else you would not be here.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: Clearing the seas with powerful weapons to buy time for the main force from the home territories to arrive. Ægir's warfare design is always simple and effective.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: But there have been anomalies in the city that we cannot ignore.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.options: The Church of the Deep?;I heard about a missing person.

attributes.content: That consul is a formidable woman.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: During Milliarium's voyage, she has culled many of the corrupted and thwarted their sabotages, while the two escorting Legions have sustained far fewer losses than expected.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: Everything has gone well... Almost too well.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: Now, a staff member in the Program has gone missing at the most crucial stage. This is just the beginning.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: I'm looking into it, and will eliminate any potential threats.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: I can enter most places and evade the Sea Patrol's regular rounds with ease.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: But I fear the problem runs deeper.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: I would rather not barge into an important lab or the consul's Pensivarium, unless I have to.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.options: I'm not your messenger to the Hunters, Ulpianus.;You should work with Rhodes Island, Ulpianus.
After all, we can help you move around the city.;After all, Ægir sees you as a threat, don't they?

attributes.content: Rhodes Island wants to work with me... and watch me, I assume? So be it.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: One more thing.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: ...Skadi.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: If you truly care about the Hunters, keep a close eye on her.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: One hundred fifty-six, one hundred fifty-seven...
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: I've never seen a port this busy.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: Are things not going well on the frontlines?
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: (Humming♪)
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: You're still in the mood for music?
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: Why not?
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Soon we might be too busy for it.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: There you are, Captain Gladiia.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: You went to see Consul Clementia with Dr. Kal'tsit right after the tribunal, right? How did it go?
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Well enough, but I was only there to make introductions. They had much to discuss, and I had no reason to stay.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: I did have a brief discussion with Clementia on the current plans for the Abyssal Hunters, though.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Ægir's Waterway will open soon. Until then, the Hunters will fight alongside the two Legions accompanying Milliarium.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: See? I was right.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Uh-huh.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: I'd rather be out there killing monsters than sit through another debate.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: So what's the mission and when do we move out?
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: The command structure and battle plans are pending discussion with the legion commanders.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Skadi—
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Hey, that's the emergency alarm, right?
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: What happened? A Seaborn invasion?
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: I am Consul Gladiia. Status report.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Yes, ma'am.
attributes.name: Legion Soldier

attributes.content: Two squadrons from Legion X were sent to deploy the beacon at Nest 37 today, as planned.
attributes.name: Legion Soldier

attributes.content: But we just received a distress signal. They were attacked by Seaborn on the way.
attributes.name: Legion Soldier

attributes.content: The Seaborn were prepared?
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: Unclear. The situation is still developing. The Academy of Technology hasn't had time to produce a report.
attributes.name: Legion Soldier

attributes.content: Are there any corvettes on standby in the port?
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Always. You can claim one by logging into the terminal.
attributes.name: Legion Soldier

attributes.content: Thank you. Keep me posted about the squadron's coordinates. Once close enough, the Abyssal Hunters will disembark and swim into battle.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Roger.
attributes.name: Legion Soldier

attributes.content: Laurentina, with me.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: ...Skadi, you stay behind.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Captain?
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: Don't overthink it.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: The contact between land and sea is paramount. Kal'tsit can't be in two places at once, so I need you to keep the Doctor safe.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: This is an order.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Received.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: That's...
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: Laurentina's group is embarking for battle? But they just came back.
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: It has something to do with the alarm. The fleet deploying the beacon at Nest 37 was attacked by Seaborn, and they're going out to help.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: You know the Abyssal Hunters?
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: I do.
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: We had a brief partnership on land, facing challenges and battling enemies together, including the Seaborn.
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: That's... impressive, given their temperament and fighting style.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: I'd go up and greet Consul Gladiia myself if we weren't in the middle of an emergency. I haven't had the opportunity since they returned.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: Does everyone in Ægir know the Hunters?
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: Of course not. But I once worked with them... and even aspired to join them.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: Someone from your team said you used to be a researcher.
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: My expertise in genetic engineering qualified me for the Abyssal Hunter program. I studied under the head of the project, who was also the first Abyssal Hunter.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: At the time, few were compatible, and even fewer successfully underwent the operation. But he and Gladiia had already achieved spectacular results.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: Their most remarkable feat was a three-day battle with the Seaborn in a hydrothermal vent that bought time for two energy survey cities to evacuate.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: The Seaborn evolve constantly. With the use of weapons strictly regulated, they were the safest and most effective countermeasure.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: I watched them leave and return every day.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: I watched them lie down in the regenerative gel, exhausted, waiting as I recorded the data, tested their functions, and repaired their bodies. Those were the costs of victory people could not see.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: I'm not entirely sure what motivated me at the time, but one day I submitted an application to become a Hunter to the Institute of Development  Planning.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: ...I'd have done the same.
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: I mean, I'd have wanted to apply myself.
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: To see your mentor and everyone else risking their lives like that... Nobody would want to feel that they weren't doing enough.
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: You seem fit enough, and as a researcher, you are beyond familiar with their functions and combat style. Wait... then why didn't you—
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: Because my application was rejected.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: But why?
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: (Shakes head)
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: I didn't ask. And my mentor wouldn't have answered.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: So you joined the Sea Patrol instead?
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: Because it's the unit that works most closely with the Hunters?
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: Yes... and monitors them.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: The corvette is ready for you.
attributes.name: Sea Patroller

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: Sorry, Irene. I shouldn't have bored you with my past.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: It's fine.
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: Back to work. As the fleet battles the Seaborn, we must also locate the missing scientist for answers. The Sea Patrol's objective remains unchanged.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: As for you, Irene. You're staying with us.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: Wait, what for?
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: We won't be in the thick of battle, but it's still dangerous. It's the Sea Patrol's duty to keep you safe.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: I appreciate it, Praefecta. But I'm good.
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: I'm not afraid of the Seaborn. Every Inquisitor has Seaborn blood on their hands.
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: Former Inquisitor, as I recall from your files.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: I appreciate your assistance during the investigation. Like I said, you're sharp... and brave.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: But you didn't come to Ægir to fight. Go back and stay with the other emissaries.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: Are you implying that the war between Ægir and the Seaborn is beyond a land dweller's comprehension?
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: ...Yes.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: Your concerns are justified, but trying to comprehend is why I'm here.
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: There are many things I... as an Iberian, need to understand: Ægir, the Seaborn, true war, and everything that's happening in the depths of the ocean.
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: The land isn't far from here. Ægir has only a single city in this region, but beyond it lies the entirety of Iberia.
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: Don't worry, I don't intend to get myself killed at sea.
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: Such maturity at your age... You must have a good mentor.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: From what I've heard, better than yours, at least.
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: ...Prepare a set of deep-water equipment for Irene.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: Let's go.
attributes.name: Secunda
